Key Match Events: The White Sox twice saw the Guardians score two runs on infield singles by the same player, Lane Thomas.
Post-Match Reflections: The loss completed a three-game sweep and put them six losses away from tying the 1962 Mets' modern-era record of 120 in a season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox home losing streak reached 15 in the loss to the Guardians.
